website_summaries.verdict: Best suited for users with straightforward drying needs, no steaming or multiple drying cycles.
pros: Powerful performance for its price range
Large lint trap handles animal hair well
Easy installation process – ideal project for homeowners
cons: Lacks a timer, may not shut off automatically

website_summaries.verdict: Attractive entry-level appliance for home renovators, landlords, and new home owners.
pros: Large door opening makes  clothing removal easier
Dries well on low energy cycles
Smaller overall capacity than others we recommend, but very efficient on shorter cycles
cons: Top-positioned vent makes cleaning a challenge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dryer. Was quick getting here easy to set up have had no issues. Great for the money
customer_reviews.author: Ham Girl

customer_reviews.title: Missing power plug
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived way ahead of schedule (A++to that). When I finally opened the box to put it in my house it was minus the electrical cord (C for that). The saving grace was the plug off my old dryer was able to work with my new one. So 4 stars instead of 5 for the missing plug.
customer_reviews.author: Dale W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much!!!!!!!!!!!! Im sure my friend Stephanie is very happy and loves her new Dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda L Gorter

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Came delivered with the door almost falling off and a huge dent across the front and on the bottom...
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Ashdown

customer_reviews.title: Good basic dryer
customer_reviews.text: This dryer was purchased @ 2 months ago to replace a 40-year old dryer that the motor finally died in. It is very basic and mechanical, no circuit boards which I like. I also purchased a supply of spare parts to service it. So far it has performed well sometimes drying 6-8 loads per day. I hope to get excellent service out of it as I did my previous dryer, which I repaired and stored as a spare.
customer_reviews.author: HistoryBuff

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on a Thursday, broke that evening. Complete refund. Go ahead and spend a bit extra for longevity; get what you pay for with this junker.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Dryer cord
customer_reviews.text: People need to know THAT dryers do not come with the CORDS. because each house, apt, ect ect uses different plug designs. Even dryers purchased from lowes, home depo, sears, do not come with dryer Cords. Really people its been like this for 20 + years
customer_reviews.author: Macks

customer_reviews.title: Great Dryer - Price Shopping Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dryer. It was very good for the price and functioned well. I was later disappointed to learn that the same dryer is sold by another major home department store for much less than is being sold here, even after considering tax and shipping. If sellers, are not pricing their products appropriately it seem disingenuous. It is my fault, of course..."buyer beware." I just don't want others making the same mistake as me.
customer_reviews.author: prricci

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 years and drum is wobbling and makes really bad rattling sound
customer_reviews.text: Had less then 2 years and drum is wobbling and makes really bad rattling sound. Spend a little more and get a better one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trodgers0729

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy
customer_reviews.text: I have had this dryer less than 2 years, and the handle broke off. Both of the ends that snap into the door broke. I called Amana, and they are sending me a new handle free of charge. I certainly hope this handle lasts longer than the first one. The cost to replace this PLASTIC handle is $30. Dryer does do a good job of drying so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy that they get dry so quickly
customer_reviews.text: It literally saved my life. I don't have a washing machine because I live in a small apartment and I usually wash clothes and sheets everyday by hand and I'm happy that they get dry so quickly
customer_reviews.author: RON  MURRAY

product_meta.title: AMANA NED4655EW 6.5 cu. ft. Front Load Electric Dryer with 11 Drying Cycles, White
product_meta.description: The product is easy to use and handle. The product is highly durable. The product is manufactured in United States.
feature_bullets: The product is manufactured in United states
